description:
IBM Sametime Mobile for iOS is the official mobile client for IBM Sametime , IBM's award-winning platform for social communications on iOS devices.

IBM Sametime Mobile for iOS is designed to leverage the IBM Sametime Proxy's highly scalable, secure and robust next-generation communications framework. Starting with version 9, IBM Sametime Mobile for iOS brings to market new and exciting capabilities to help you take your people networks with you when you go on the road. It gives you access to their insight and expertise right from your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch to accelerate your business processes, improve decision-making and efficiency and, ultimately, energize your life's work like never before.

Key features:
• Rich presence including geographic location
• One-to-one and group chat
• Chat history
• Broadcast announcements
• Search corporate directory for individual contacts
• Send and receive photos
• Push-notification support
• Support for multiple communities
• URL-based, one-click configuration

What's New:
• Softphone
• A brand new user interface on the iPad
• Point-to-point audio on phones
• Point-to-point audio and video for iPads
• Server-side policy updates
• Runs on iOS 7

Connectivity requirements:
IBM Sametime Mobile for iOS supports both the IBM Sametime 8.5.2 IFR 1 Proxy and the new IBM Sametime 9 Proxy. However, the new voice and video capabilities are only available when connecting to an IBM Sametime 9 Proxy instance.

Any problems found with the IBM Sametime Mobile Client can be reported through the Wiki listed in the App Store support URL 

A current list of IBM trademarks is available on the web as http://www.ibm.com/legal/copytrade.shtml.  All references to names in the images refer to fictitious company and fictitious persons, designed for illustration purposes only.
